post_number.description: esa.io post number (required for updates, omit for new posts)

name.description: Post title (max 255 bytes, cannot contain /, fullwidth parentheses （）, or fullwidth colon ：)

category.description: Category path (must match allowed categories and end with /yyyy/mm/dd format, e.g., LLM/Tasks/2025/01/18)

body_md.description: Post body in Markdown (max 1MB, cannot start with ---)
